title: Creative Team
content:
ABOUT OGILVY SOCIAL.LAB
Ogilvy Social.Lab is not a traditional agency. We are an agency born for the Social & Digital Age. Ogilvy Social.Lab operates as a real LAB and thrives at the intersection of modern marketing & creativity. We cherish our entrepreneurial spirit and embrace the opportunity to rethink marketing and communications – constantly challenging the status quo.
Social.Lab was acquired by Ogilvy in 2013, is headquartered in Brussels but now work borderlessly across the globe.
From our Brussels HQ we are currently working for numerous local and international clients incl. IKEA, Google, Coca-Cola, Absolut, Milka, Philadelphia, Nestle, Côte d’Or and several European & Belgian institutions, and many more. 
We are growing fast, and we love it. We know that our success is a direct result of our talents.
 
ROLE
Are you someone positively curious, driven by a passion for pushing creative boundaries? If you're tired of conventional roles and believe that creativity and innovation, go hand in hand, Ogilvy Social Lab invites you to join our team!
We're on the lookout for a dynamic duo, a creative team that defies traditional norms. If you find joy in creating experiences that transcend marketing boundaries and are fascinated by the diverse ways people engage with brands, you're the talent we want to welcome.
Join us as we redefine the standards of social creativity. And here's the exciting part – we're not just looking for talent in Brussels. Whether you're in Berlin, London, or any other location, feel free to apply. We embrace remote collaboration, and your innovative ideas can contribute to our dynamic team, even if you're not based in Brussels.
 
RESPONSIBILITIES

Embrace a social-first mindset, open to trans-media ideas that go beyond traditional campaigns.
Understand and appreciate the nature and value of our clients' brands. Familiarize yourself with the product landscape and stay informed about what’s going on in the market.
Engage in the briefing process, ensuring proper kickstarts and brand propositions for a comprehensive understanding.
Technical Proficiency: For Art Directors, an outstanding knowledge of DTP and retouching; for Copywriters, manage projects from ideation to execution, collaborating with specialists.
Collaboration and Defending Ideas: Collaborate with specialists, defend your ideas, tone of voice, and wording choices. Challenge creative briefs and suggest additional ideas that showcase our creative potential.
Stay Current: Stay up-to-date on social media trends and formats, finding creative ways to leverage them for engaging campaigns.

 
PROFILE

Proven experience in a similar role, demonstrating your ability to contribute to creative excellence.
Exceptional fluency in English.
Creativity and originality that align with the innovative spirit of Ogilvy Social Lab.
Effective teamwork and communication skills, fostering collaboration within the creative team.
A natural curiosity for current trends in popular and digital culture, coupled with foresight into future advertising landscapes.
Insight into human behavior and motivational needs, demonstrating a deep understanding of your audience.
A keen sense of color and form to contribute to the visual and aesthetic aspects of the creative process.
Ability to work well under pressure, meeting tight deadlines while maintaining the quality of work.
Interest in immersing yourself in award annuals to explore and appreciate outstanding work in the field.
A strong desire to learn and upskill, showcasing a commitment to personal and professional growth.
Conceptualization skills that bring forth brave, fresh, and world-class ideas.

 
OFFER

Fulltime opportunity in an ever-growing, trendsetting advertising agency based in the greenest building in Brussels – the new WPP Campus.  
Work alongside a team of diverse and people-focused individuals, on impactful projects and with an array of local, regional and global clients.  
We are committed to keeping our environmental footprint low and ensuring that our work is ethical. 
We thrive on transparency – Our words and promises produce actions.  
Enjoy attractive employment benefits including:  

A flexible working policy, 
Eco vouchers, 
Cafeteria plans, 
3 insurance options, 
A car or mobility budget (seniority-dependant), 
Relevant IT equipment and
Access to the company rooftop to take an occasional break, while overlooking the breath-taking city 

As an Ogilvy Social. Lab employee, you will be provided with continuous opportunities to grow through training, and career conversations, while doing strong work, that works on a daily basis.  



At Ogilvy, our people are at the heart of what we do: a creative agency that sparks game-changing ideas across culture and business through collaboration, integrity, and a celebration of self-expression. 
We believe in building powerful teams with purpose. This means hiring and nurturing talent across all races, ethnicities, religions, abilities, sexual orientation, and gender identities – and we relentlessly curate transformative initiatives that make our commitment to fairness, and equity a reality. 
Our ultimate mission is to leave a positive impact on the world, creating a better future for all, while supporting and uplifting the global communities we serve.  This is central to our mantra of Borderless Creativity.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran.
